item.title: The Lower Class – The Sound In The Soul
item.dc:creator: ~lork
item.content:encoded:
More output from The Lower Class as they build up to the release of ‘Wingfield’, the LP due out 31st of this month. Their new-found sound is real nice, laid-back-chill-soul vibes. Anyway here are visuals to their first leak from the release. Check them out – and have a peep of their previous sounds too.

 

Continue Reading

Related posts:

  1. AUDIO: The Lower Class – The Sound In the Soul
  2. The Lower Class – The Proof
  3. FREENESS: The Lower Class – Flight Of Ideas

item.title: Lupe Fiasco – Lamborghini Angels
item.dc:creator: ~lork
item.content:encoded:
Any doubts I had about Food And Liquor II have been quashed. This is Lupe at his best, raw lyricism you won’t find in anyone or anything else right about now. Backed by a synth beat which sounds like it’d come straight outta Bladerunner chase scene in a kick+subwoofer shop, Lupe’s impeccable flow doesn’t give you any time for any rest. This is full on. This is epic.

Continue Reading

Related posts:

  1. FREENESS: Lupe Fiasco x Palm Of Ice – Kind Of Lu (Palm Of Ice Rmxs)
  2. Lupe Fiasco – Bitch Bad
  3. Pete Rock Slams Lupe Fiasco for ‘T.R.O.Y.’ Bite

item.title: Purpose & Confidence – Vision of Excellence (feat. Cormega & Estee Nack)
item.dc:creator: 602Diggler
item.content:encoded:
So the homie “Confidence” just hit me off with a heat rock he produced that features Cormega,Estee Nack and Purpose… Ill Adrenaline Records is back with another classic release! Purpose, founding member of the group Tragic Allies, teams up with extraordinary producer Confidence of Rashad & Confidence fame to bring you the firstsingle off the forthcoming full length “The Purpose of Confidence”. “Visionof Excellence” features none other than Queensbridge legend Cormega alongwith Tragic Allies member Estee Nack and cuts by D.J. Technic.. Don’t Sleep, Keep us locked for more of your fresh servings.. hit the jump for more active..

Continue Reading

Related posts:

  1. AUDIO: Cormega – M.A.R.S. Feat. Action Bronson, Roc Marciano & Saigon
  2. AUDIO: Rashad & Confidence – Brand New (Exclusive)
  3. AUDIO: Rashad – Pass Me By (Prod. Confidence)

item.title: Why Marvin Gaye Lives On Through Hip-Hop (Food 4 Thought)
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.content:encoded:
Of all the Motown artists, Marvin Gaye was the deepest and often the darkest. Although Gil Scott-Heron is regularly credited with laying down the foundations for hip-hop, I believe Marvin also played his part. This article aims to pay tribute to his genius and lasting legacy within a hip-hop community thankful for his contributions.

The first thing you will notice when delving into the subject, is how often his name pops up through a broad range of artists. Who could forget 2Pac’s lyrics in ”Keep Ya Head Up”, when Pac rapped:
“I remember Marvin Gaye, used to sing to me
He had me feeling like black..

Continue Reading

Related posts:

  1. Why Commercial Artists Have No Love For The Underground (FOOD 4 THOUGHT)
  2. FOOD 4 THOUGHT: Why Sopa And Pipa must be stopped.
  3. FOOD 4 THOUGHT: Che Guevara With Bling On And The Contradiction Of Islamic Hip-Hop

item.title: Monk’ – Raw Futuristics (France)
item.dc:creator: 602Diggler
item.content:encoded:
Raw Futuristics is that audible statement to let you all know that times are changing, the evolution of music through influential assets of the Future.. The Foundation of this dope project by composer “Monk” is that of the entitled 15 heat rock set of “Raw Futuristics”.. This is now.. This is WIB2.0 so slap this properly.. ghea!! Hit that jump for more info..

Monk’ is a 23 years old schizophrenic french beatmaker coming from Paris. You can be sure every project will be different from the last one..versatility is a will-VIA BANDCAMP

Related posts:

  1. Melodious Monk & Tranzformer – Slangin Nouns
  2. MF DOOM Signee, The Dark Monk, Releasing Debut Album

item.title: Isaiah Toothtaker & Mestizo – Humansuit
item.dc:creator: 602Diggler
item.content:encoded:
Machina Muerte’s duo that started it all, Isaiah Toothtaker and Mestizo dropped the new HumanSuit EP.. 3 tracks to get you acquainted to the sounds of the Humansuit.. Early in the year HUMANSUIT released “Lawnmower Man” produced by Flying Lotus, featuring fellow Machina Muerte member Gonjasufi, & have also announced a free EP release for 8/28. Hit the jump for further clarity.. ghea!

Today Isaiah Toothtaker & Mestizo make this next Mainframe produced song “Mourning” available to stream. This single radiates thug harmony in bboy disposition over thundering funk backed with drums that thump like a criminal’s pulse preparing..

Continue Reading

Related posts:

  1. VIDEO: Isaiah Toothtaker – Hyperbolic Chamber Music
  2. Isaiah Toothtaker – Sea Punk Funk (Prod. by SIXTOO)
  3. Brother Ali – Stop The Press (First Single Off New Album)

item.title: Kev Brown – Makeba
item.dc:creator: •J•
item.content:encoded:
Brand new goodness from Kev Brown, a conjoint release between Low Budget records and Redefinition. “Makeba” is the first single out of Kev brown’s upcoming “South Africa Dedication EP”

Get the vinyl which includes a jacket with an original illustration by JOE BUCK & detailed liner notes of Kev’s travels and how they inspired him to make this project.

BUY DIGI: itunes.apple.com/us/album/south-africa-dedication-ep/id543981929
BUY VINYL: http://www.redefinitionrecords.com/products/kev-brown-south-africa-dedication-black

Continue Reading

Related posts:

  1. AUDIO: Boog Brown – Detroit (prod. Apollo Brown)
  2. AUDIO: Boog Brown – Baby Girl (V1 & V2)
  3. Kev Brown – Random Joints

item.title: Jeremiah Jae – Raw Money Raps
item.dc:creator: ~lork
item.content:encoded:
Listening to Raw Money Raps has been on my ‘To Do List’ for a few weeks now. I finally got around to it last night and, yeah, I’m glad I did.

“I think it’s safe to say Jeremiah Jae is one of my favorite artists of his generation. For years now I’ve been a witness to the incredible progression of his craft. This album has a complex dedication and honesty that I search for in myself with my own art. Underrated and understated, Jae is ready to show these muhfuckers what’s really good. Believe in Jeremiah Jae” – Flying..

Continue Reading

Related posts:

  1. Azizi Gibson & Jeremiah Jae – Ignorant Prayers
  2. Booda French – Make Money, Money Don’t (UK)
  3. Azizi Gibson – Intro (yammaha)

item.title: JD Era – Turn This Up feat. Sarkodie (Canada)
item.dc:creator: Tasha
item.content:encoded:
Toronto rapper JD Era just dropped this hot new track aptly entitled “Turn This Up”. The track features Ghanian rapper Sarkodie who was the first African Artist to be signed to Akon’s Konvict Music. Check it out after the jump.

Sarokide: Twitter

Continue Reading

Related posts:

  1. SonReal – I Feel Like feat. Rapper Pooh (Canada)
  2. AUDIO: Rich Kidd – Say I (Remix) feat. Saukrates (Canada)
